    • Field Detail

      • UNDO_MODE_OFF

        public static final int UNDO_MODE_OFF
        Undo mode and marks that do not use undo. If this mode was set, all undo history will be destroyed and set to null.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNDO_MODE_DISABLED

        public static final int UNDO_MODE_DISABLED
        Undo mode and marks that undo was disabled for a while. UNDO_MODE_OFF does mean no not use undo manager forever and destroy all undo history but this does mean not mark on undo stack while this mode was set. This can be used during edit text without history.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNDO_MODE_AUTOMARK

        public static final int UNDO_MODE_AUTOMARK
        Default undo mode. This mode automatically sense that insert, replace, or delete texts and add to history.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNDO_MODE_OPENED

        public static final int UNDO_MODE_OPENED
        Undo mode and marks that all actions will be marked in one Actions. This is the mode that put all actions while this mode was set in one action. So, if undo() or redo() called, all actions with this mode will be edited.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public UndoManager()

      • closeActions

        public void closeActions()

      • getUndoMode

        public int getUndoMode()

      • setMode

        public int setMode(int mode)
        Set the undo / redo stack mode. If mode set to UNDO_MODE_OFF, all history will be destroyed.

      • openActions

        public void openActions()
        Open the undo actions. Used when undo mode is UNDO_MODE_OPENED and if there is any opened Actions, close it and open new Actions.

      • openUndoActionsTemporary

        public void openUndoActionsTemporary()
        Open the undo actions if current undo mode marks actions.
        See Also:
        this#openActions()

      • closeUndoActionsTemporary

        public void closeUndoActionsTemporary()
        Close the actions if when called openUndoActionsTemporary() opened the actions and restore to last mode.

      • disableUndo

        public int disableUndo()
        Used when temporary disable undo mode.

      • enableUndo

        public void enableUndo()
        Used when current mode is UNDO_MODE_DISABLED or called disableUndo(); this re-enables undo mode. For instance, when mode is a and called disableUndo() and later called this method, actions between calling disableUndo() and calling this will be not marked on undo history.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if undo mode is not disabled

      • beforeTextChanged

        public void beforeTextChanged(java.lang.CharSequence text,
